./

oseentensor__define.pro


Oseen tensor base class for describing hydrodynamic flows relative to specified positions.

Author information

Author

David G. Grier, New York University.

Copyright

Copyright (c) 2015 David G. Grier

Class description for oseentensor

Inheritance

  • IDL_OBJECT

Subclasses: Gsourcedoublet Gstokesdoublet Gstokeslet

Properties

Properties in oseentensor

position get set init

three-element array of Cartesian coordinates specifying position of the source.

tensor get

3x3 array specifying the elements of the Oseen tensor.

viscosity get set init

viscosity of fluid in SI units.
